document_data.name: ''Reflective Shield''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Reflective shields''''' were [[enchanted]] [[shield]]s that offered protection from elements, popularized in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: ''Reflective shields'' sheltered the wearer against mundane and magical fire and cold, as well as absorbed additional harm when the wielder of the shield was severely injured.
document_data.History: In the 15{{th}} century DR, various ''reflective shields'' could be found among bandits and heroes of the [[Sword Mountains]], the city of [[Neverwinter]], its environs, the town of [[Helm's Hold]], and ruins of [[Illefarn]].
